title: Mouse Pointer, chat, and mini map really small not playable
body:
Just got a new computer for work and my mouse, mini map, and chat are all very small. So small that with the moust pointer like that the game is unplayable. Are there any fixes for this? I didn't see an in game setting to change the mouse. 

I have searched around the web but couldn't really find a solution other than people saying lol doesn't work well with high end monitors...I also found a few window settings which make the mouse a tad bigger but still not playable.

replies.body:
Grats on your new rig!  Is the monitor you're using 4K?  That could be a cause, otherwise your League settings may be using old settings so it needs a refresh.  See if a config reset can help out here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

I have same problem. Pllaying on a Zenbook with 3200x1800 screen.. Cant see mouse og chat.. Not playable anymore. Adjusted screen resolution for lol, but no help :-( HAve to stop playing until I find a workaround.

Ok, I tried about 50 different things before finding a solution. I also saw there are some 3rd party cursors (yolo) that do it too. I assume that would cause me to get banned so I did not try it. 

The only thing that works is lowering the resolution of the game. However, I noticed that if I tab out at any time it makes the mouse small again...so apparently now I have another issue to figure out. Hopefully this helps someone else though. Just change the resolution in game not your actual PC resolution. 

To the Devs - just fix this issue. Seems pretty easy to allow people to adjust the size of the mouse. Also allow them to make the other things even bigger, like the mini map and chat box. In 2018 this game should be running perfectly on a 4k monitor.
